title: Former Top Russia Adviser Fiona Hill Testifies on Capitol Hill About Ukraine
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump’s former top Russia adviser testified before House committees on Monday as part of the impeachment inquiry examining the president, his administration and his allies’ dealings with Ukraine.

Fiona Hill, who served on the National Security Council, left the administration in August. She was expected to have been asked about her knowledge of efforts by the president and his lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, to press Ukraine to mount investigations into Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden and his son,...
description: President Trump’s former top Russia adviser testified before House committees as part of the impeachment inquiry examining the president, his administration and his allies’ dealings with Ukraine.
